text: O Pagador de Promessas (, Keeper of PromisesThe title translates literally as The Payer of Promises, but the film has been known by several other names in the English-speaking world, such as Keeper of Promises, The Given Word and The Promise.) is a 1962 Brazilian drama movie directed by Anselmo Duarte and starring Leonardo Villar, Othon Bastos, Antônio Pitanga, Glória Menezes. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1963. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1962 drama movies Category:Brazilian movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Anselmo Duarte
title: O Pagador de Promessas
